Outcome: Caries in permanent teeth: DMFT (3 years)
Reasons for GRADE if not High:
Downgraded for risk of bias: sequence generation method unclear, and participants were not blinded.
Downgraded for indirectness: applicability of evidence to different settings and populations unclear; there was not much baseline information about the population in the study.

Downgraded for risk of bias: sequence generation method unclear, and participants were not blinded.
